description: A dashboard to help manage Kubernetes cluster costs and resources

panels.description: Monthly estimated costs according to latest 1 hour resource usage, Note, if you use virtual kubelet or EKS Pod, we do not compute the virtual node costs.

targets.expr:
sum (
    avg(
        avg_over_time(node_total_hourly_cost[1h])
        * on (node) group_left() max(kube_node_labels{label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type!~"eklet", label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type!~"eklet"}) by (node)
    )
     
by (node)) * 730 * ($Discount/100.0)

sum(
  sum(
    sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu", unit="core"}) by (container, pod, node, namespace) 
    * on (node) group_left() 
    avg(
      avg_over_time(node_cpu_hourly_cost[1h]) * on (node) group_left() max(kube_node_labels{label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type!~"eklet",label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type!~"eklet"}) by (node) 
    ) by (node)
    
)

+

sum(
  sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", unit="byte", namespace!=""} / 1024./ 1024. / 1024.) by (container, pod, node, namespace) 
  * on (node) group_left() 
  avg(
    avg_over_time(node_ram_hourly_cost[1h]) * on (node) group_left() max(kube_node_labels{label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type!~"eklet", label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type!~"eklet"}) by (node)
  ) by (node) 
  
)
) * 730 * ($Discount/100.0)

panels.title: Estimated Monthly Cluster Resource Costs

panels.description: This table shows the comparison of application CPU usage vs the capacity of the node (measured over last 60 minutes)

targets.expr:
avg(
  avg_over_time(node_cpu_hourly_cost[1h]) 
  * on (node) group_left() max(kube_node_labels{label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type!~"eklet", label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type!~"eklet"}) by (node)
) by (node)  * ($Discount/100.)

sum(

  sum(
    label_replace(irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{container!=""}[1h]), "node", "$1", "instance",  "(^[^:]+)")  
     * on (node) group_left() max(kube_node_labels{label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type!~"eklet", label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type!~"eklet"}) by (node) 
  ) by (container, pod, node, namespace) 

  * on (node) group_left() 
 
  avg(
    avg_over_time(node_cpu_hourly_cost[1h])  
    * on (node) group_left() max(kube_node_labels{label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type!~"eklet", label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type!~"eklet"}) by (node) 
  ) by (node) 

) by (node)  * ($Discount/100.)

sum(

  sum(
    label_replace(avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes{container!=""}[1h]), "node", "$1", "instance",  "(^[^:]+)") 
    * on (node) group_left() max(kube_node_labels{label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type!~"eklet", label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type!~"eklet"}) by (node)
  ) by (container, pod, node, namespace) / 1024.0 / 1024.0 / 1024.0 

  * on (node) group_left()

  avg(
    avg_over_time(node_ram_hourly_cost[1h]) 
    * on (node) group_left() max(kube_node_labels{label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type!~"eklet", label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type!~"eklet"}) by (node) 
  ) by (node)
  
) by (node)  * ($Discount/100.)

avg(
  avg_over_time(node_total_hourly_cost[1h])
  * on (node) group_left() max(kube_node_labels{label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type!~"eklet", label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type!~"eklet"}) by (node) 
) by (node) * ($Discount/100.)

panels.title: Node Resource Cost & Utilization

panels.description: Current CPU utilization from applications usage vs allocatable CPU

targets.expr:
sum(label_replace(irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{container!=""}[5m]), "node", "$1", "instance",  "(^[^:]+)")  * on (node) group_left() max(kube_node_labels{label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type!="eklet", label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type!~"eklet"}) by (node))

/

sum(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="cpu", unit="core"} * on (node) group_left() max(kube_node_labels{label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type!="eklet", label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type!~"eklet"}) by (node)) 

* 100

panels.title: CPU Utilization

panels.description: Current CPU reservation requests from applications vs allocatable CPU

targets.expr:
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu", unit="core"} * on (node) group_left() max(kube_node_labels{label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type!="eklet", label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type!~"eklet"}) by (node) ) 
/ 
sum(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="cpu", unit="core"} * on (node) group_left() max(kube_node_labels{label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type!="eklet", label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type!~"eklet"}) by (node) )
* 100

panels.title: CPU Requests

panels.description: Current RAM use vs RAM available

targets.expr:
sum(label_replace(container_memory_working_set_bytes{container!=""}, "node", "$1", "instance",  "(^[^:]+)")  * on (node) group_left() max(kube_node_labels{label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type!="eklet", label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type!~"eklet"}) by (node))

/

sum(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="memory", unit="byte"} * on (node) group_left() max(kube_node_labels{label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type!="eklet", label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type!~"eklet"}) by (node) ) 
* 100

panels.title: RAM Utilization

panels.description: Current RAM requests vs RAM available

targets.expr:
(
 sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", unit="byte", namespace!=""}  * on (node) group_left() max(kube_node_labels{label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type!="eklet", label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type!~"eklet"}) by (node) )
 /
 sum(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="memory", unit="byte"}  * on (node) group_left() max(kube_node_labels{label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type!="eklet", label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type!~"eklet"}) by (node) )
) * 100

panels.title: RAM Requests

targets.expr: SUM(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="cpu", unit="core"}  * on (node) group_left() max(kube_node_labels{label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type!="eklet", label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type!~"eklet"}) by (node))

SUM(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu", unit="core"}  * on (node) group_left() max(kube_node_labels{label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type!="eklet", label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type!~"eklet"}) by (node))

sum(label_replace(irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{container!=""}[5m]), "node", "$1", "instance",  "(^[^:]+)")  * on (node) group_left() max(kube_node_labels{label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type!="eklet", label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type!~"eklet"}) by (node))

SUM(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="memory", unit="byte"}  * on (node) group_left() max(kube_node_labels{label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type!="eklet", label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type!~"eklet"}) by (node)  / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 )

SUM(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", unit="byte", namespace!=""} * on (node) group_left() max(kube_node_labels{label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type!="eklet", label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type!~"eklet"}) by (node)/ 1024 / 1024 / 1024)

SUM(label_replace(container_memory_working_set_bytes{id="/"}, "node", "$1", "instance",  "(^[^:]+)")  * on (node) group_left() max(kube_node_labels{label_beta_kubernetes_io_instance_type!="eklet", label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type!~"eklet"}) by (node)) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024

sum by (node) (label_replace(irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{container!=""}[5m]), "node", "$1", "instance",  "(^[^:]+)"))/sum by (node) (kube_node_status_capacity{resource="cpu", unit="core",node!~"eklet"})

sum by (node) (label_replace(container_memory_working_set_bytes{container!=""}, "node", "$1", "instance",  "(^[^:]+)"))/sum by (node) (kube_node_status_capacity{resource="memory", unit="byte",node!~"eklet"})

title: Cluster Cost & Utilization Overview Copy
